description: Saudi Arabia, the UAE and Qatar all condemned the Israeli parliament's decision to ban UNRWA, warning of the grave consequences the decision will have.
title: Gulf states condemn Israel's UNRWA ban

description: Meanwhile, the UN warned that almost 25 million people require humanitarian assistance, with over 750,000 people suffering from "catastrophic" food insecurity.
title: War in Sudan has displaced over 14 million, or about 30% of the population, UN says

description: The human rights group said it documented cases where people detained at the Al-Jadaa camp in northern Iraq faced beatings, electric shock and suffocation.
title: Iraqis returning from Syria face torture: Amnesty

description: Analysis of satellite images suggest Israeli attacks caused damage to a base in Shahroud, where ballistic missiles are built and rockets are launched.
title: Satellite photos show Israeli strike likely hit important Iran Revolutionary Guard missile base

description: Erdogan said Turkey will be increasing its long-range missile capabilities in the coming period and wants to achieve full independence in the defence industry.

description: Three Muslim men sued in 2013 after being put on the No Fly List for refusing to spy on US Muslim communities, despite no evidence of them posing threats.

description: UN agencies said on Tuesday that Israel's UNRWA ban could lead in the deaths of more children in Gaza, amid a year-long devastating conflict.
title: UNRWA ban could kill more children in Gaza, UNICEF says

description: Netflix's decision to remove Palestinian films from its catalogue has sparked outrage, with a petition for their reinstatement gathering over 12,000 signatures

description: The UN Special Rapporteur’s latest report accuses Israel of systematic forced displacement, destruction, and genocidal intent against Palestinians in Gaza.

description: Spain's Interior Ministry announced on Tuesday that it plans to end its ammunition purchase contract with an Israeli company.

description: Italy's strict migration policies, supported by the EU, have led to serious human rights abuses for migrants, as they face violence and pushbacks to Libya

description: The Israeli Knesset has approved the preliminary reading of a bill which would allow Israel to deport family members of Palestinians who carried out attacks

description: VP Kamala Harris will deliver her campaign's closing argument on Tuesday in Washington, at the same site where Trump spoke before the Jan. 6 Capitol attack.

description: Iran's government plans to raise its military budget by around 200%, government spokesperson Fatemeh Mohajerani was reported as saying by state media on Tuesday

description: Black voices are under attack in the UK. This Black History Month, let's focus not only on celebration but also on protecting our story, says Richard Sudan.

description: Ireland has urged the European Union to reconsider its trade relations with Israel, condemning as "despicable" the Israeli parliament’s decision to ban UNRWA.
